title: BM Habitat Mall
details: <div>Address: Gokulam Main Rd</div><div>3rd Block, Jayalakshmipuram</div><div>Mysuru, Karnataka 570012</div><div><br></div><div>Description:</div><div>Easyday stores are one-stop shops that cater to every family day-to-day needs. They bring together a wide range of relevant goods, high quality products and great in-store experience and service, all under one roof. These neighbourhood format stores offer more than 3,000 products at the lowest prices.</div><div><br></div><div>Google map:https://goo.gl/maps/Ak6qssrped22</div>

title: Badsha Stores
details: <div>Address: Shop# 5, Vishveshwarya Bhawan, K.R Circle, Mysuru, Karnataka 570001</div><div>Phone:0821 400 4023</div><div><br></div><div>Description:</div><div>The legacy of the Badsha brand dates back to almost 10 decades when Badsha started off as a small village store near Mangalore. Over the years Badsha has grown into a very trusted and popular brand in Karnataka, with Ethnic Indian wear retail chain of stores in Bangalore, Mysore and Virajpet. Badsha Stores was a signature store for the Badsha brand that was started in 1964. Over the years the store has transformed with time to cater to clients from different regions for all kinds of clothing in silks, Sarees and fabrics.</div><div>&nbsp;</div><div>Badsha Stores has an exquisite collection of silks and sarees directly sourced from weavers and artisans from villages in Karnataka , Tamil Nadu and Andra Pradesh and in an around the old mysore region.</div><div>&nbsp;</div><div>The Badsha's have patrons from all over the world for products such as 100% pure silk from the Mysore region, Kanjevaram, Dharmavaram, Aarni, Pochampalli, Cotton silk blends from TN, Banarasi silk sarees, brocades, and fabrics, 100% pure silk scarves, stoles, ties and duvet covers.</div><div>&nbsp;</div><div>There are clients who feel nostalgic when they come to buy clothes for their children's wedding since they also had shopped for their wedding trousseau few decades ago at the same place; such has been the wonderful experience of clients who have been in their fold since generations.</div><div>&nbsp;</div><div>Badsha stores has catered to the customers all over the world and even to the Royal family of the Mysore. Mysore being a prominent tourist destination has hosted a lot of global celebrities and they have never missed an opportunity to shop at Badsha Stores.</div><div><br></div><div><br></div><div>Google map:https://goo.gl/maps/T3P3jQ9TCwv</div>
